name: Aces Up Solitaire card game
description:
Play the Aces Up Solitaire card game where you match cards against each suit. Clear all cards except Aces to win and get a high score!

Multiple card and background patterns to choose from
User stats that tracks max score
A hint system that shows possible moves
An auto play mode where you can sit back, relax and watch the computer play the game by itself
Game is not timed, so you can take as much time as you like

How to play?
In this game, one deck of cards (without the Joker cards) is shuffled and kept face down.

Four cards are dealed at the same time, face up, into four vertical stacks. You can remove a card by matching cards of the same suit against each other. In this game Aces is ranked high, followed by K, Q, J, 10, 9, .... 3, 2. If there are two or more cards of the same suit, the lower ranking card can be removed to the discard pile.
Keep discarding until only Aces are left, one card in each stack, or there are no possible cards to discard.
If there are more cards in deck, the can be dealt, four at a time.

The game is won when only Aces are left on the playing table, each Ace on a single stack, with no other cards.

For detailed instructions on how to play, please click on the help button inside the game screen.
